org.sql: SELECT work_packages.* FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.id NOT IN (SELECT relations.to_id FROM relations WHERE relations.includes <> 0 AND relations.hierarchy = 0 AND relations.relates = 0 AND relations.duplicates = 0 AND relations.follows = 0 AND relations.blocks = 0 AND relations.requires = 0 AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND relations.from_id = 247)

rewrites.sql: SELECT work_packages.* FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.id NOT IN (SELECT relations.to_id FROM relations WHERE relations.includes <> 0 AND relations.hierarchy = 0 AND relations.relates = 0 AND relations.duplicates = 0 AND relations.follows = 0 AND relations.blocks = 0 AND relations.requires = 0 AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND relations.from_id = 247 LIMIT 1)
